by.batseko.library.dao.book

Interface BookDAO


  • public interface BookDAO
    Interface describes the opportunity that data source provide to store and restore Book entity

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBook(by.batseko.library.entity.book.Book book, int quantity)
      Saves the Book into data source and add quantityBook's into BookInstanceDAO.
      java.util.List<by.batseko.library.dto.BookDTO> findAllBooksDTO(int currentPage, int recordsPerPage)
      Returns the BookDTO list which contains a Book int common instance quantity, and int available instance quantity If no such book contains into data source returns emptyList LibraryDAOException if an error occurs while getting a book
      by.batseko.library.entity.book.Book findBookByUUID(java.lang.String bookUUID)
      Retrieves and returns the Book If no such book contains into data source returns throws LibraryDAOException if an error occurs while getting a book
      int findBookQuantityByFields(by.batseko.library.entity.book.Book book)
      Returns the book's quantity by transferred Book If no such book contains into data source returns throws LibraryDAOException if an error occurs while getting a book
      java.util.List<by.batseko.library.dto.BookDTO> findBooksDTOByFields(by.batseko.library.entity.book.Book book, int currentPage, int recordsPerPage)
      Returns the BookDTO list which contains a Book int common instance quantity, and int available instance quantity If no such book contains into data source returns emptyList LibraryDAOException if an error occurs while getting a book

    • Method Detail

      • addBook

        void addBook(by.batseko.library.entity.book.Book book,
             int quantity)
      throws by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryDAOException
        Saves the Book into data source and add quantityBook's into BookInstanceDAO. Throws LibraryDAOException if an error occurs while writing a book
        Parameters:
        book - the Book that must be added to data source
        quantity - quantity of Book's that should be added into BookInstanceDAO.
        Throws:
        by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryDAOException - if an error occurs while writing a book

      • findAllBooksDTO

        java.util.List<by.batseko.library.dto.BookDTO> findAllBooksDTO(int currentPage,
                                                               int recordsPerPage)
                                                        throws by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryDAOException
        Returns the BookDTO list which contains a Book int common instance quantity, and int available instance quantity If no such book contains into data source returns emptyList LibraryDAOException if an error occurs while getting a book
        Parameters:
        currentPage - is the current page parameter for pagination
        recordsPerPage - is the records per page parameter for pagination
        Returns:
        BookDTO which contains a Book, int common instance quantity, and int available instance quantity
        Throws:
        by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryDAOException - if an error occurs while getting a book

      • findBookByUUID

        by.batseko.library.entity.book.Book findBookByUUID(java.lang.String bookUUID)
                                            throws by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryDAOException
        Retrieves and returns the Book If no such book contains into data source returns throws LibraryDAOException if an error occurs while getting a book
        Parameters:
        bookUUID - the Book's uuid
        Returns:
        Book
        Throws:
        by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryDAOException - if an error occurs while adding a book

      • findBookQuantityByFields

        int findBookQuantityByFields(by.batseko.library.entity.book.Book book)
                      throws by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryDAOException
        Returns the book's quantity by transferred Book If no such book contains into data source returns throws LibraryDAOException if an error occurs while getting a book
        Parameters:
        book - is the Book which contains non-empty fields which using to construct search query
        Returns:
        a book quantity by constructed search query
        Throws:
        by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryDAOException - if an error occurs while getting a book quantity

      • findBooksDTOByFields

        java.util.List<by.batseko.library.dto.BookDTO> findBooksDTOByFields(by.batseko.library.entity.book.Book book,
                                                                    int currentPage,
                                                                    int recordsPerPage)
                                                             throws by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryDAOException
        Returns the BookDTO list which contains a Book int common instance quantity, and int available instance quantity If no such book contains into data source returns emptyList LibraryDAOException if an error occurs while getting a book
        Parameters:
        book - is the Book which contains non-empty fields which using to construct search query
        currentPage - is the current page parameter for pagination
        recordsPerPage - is the records per page parameter for pagination
        Returns:
        list of BookDTO which contains a Book, int common instance quantity, and int available instance quantity
        Throws:
        by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryDAOException - if an error occurs while getting a book
